pr_title: First attempt add LSP-based rename refactoring to the Java LSP Server and the LSP Client.

timeline.message: First attempt add LSP-based rename refactoring to the Java LSP Server and the LSP Client.
Merging master into the lsp-rename-refactoring branch.

Implement cancelability for refactorings

Primary aim of this change is to be able to cancel dialog from
refactoring, without raising UnsupportedOperationException.
Register rename action into the popup menu
Ensure TokenSequence is accessed under document lock
